name: <FONT COLOR="#00FFFF"> Micro-fiber cloth - Sticks to any Cell Phone or Electronic device</FONT>
description:
CONTACT US AT: payment@magikshroom.com INCLUDES: One(1) magik shroom digi clean micro fiber cloth.(cell phone NOT included) For superior cleaning and maximum portability accept no substitute. It sticks to the back of almost any phone and also sticks to almost every electronic out there(cameras, video cameras, ipods, mp3 players etc.) Your imagination is the limit!




*Removes dirt and fingerprints in one swipe *Self-adheres anywhere on device when not in use *Can be hidden and worn with your cell phone case (or electronic device case) *Self-adhesive is effective Thousands of times without wearing out or leaving sticky residue behind. *Micro fiber will not scratch surfaces How to use: With the printed side of the digi clean facing down, remove the dirt from your LCD by scrubbing lightly with your finger tip. When you are not using it, stick the printed side face up onto the cell phone body. It will fit under cell phone cases so it is hidden until needed. It can be taken on and off Thousands of times without falling off or leaving any sticky residue. It is simple yet more effective than most of the micro fiber cloths out there!
